DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Disease Emphysema Bronchitis Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator relating to medication use and therapy for lung disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Disease Emphysema Bronchitis Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to emphysema, inflation of the alveoli, alveolar wall damage, and reduction in the number of alveoli, resulting in difficulty breathing, or bronchitis, inflammation (swelling and reddening) of the bronchi, and a therapeutic procedure (administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subcategory of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).  It occurs in people who smoke and suffer from chronic bronchitis.  It is characterized by inflation of the alveoli, alveolar wall damage, and reduction in the number of alveoli, resulting in difficulty breathing.  Alveoli are the vital lung structures where the transfer of oxygen and carbon dioxide takes place. -- 2004:(bron-KYE-tis) Inflammation (swelling and reddening) of the bronchi.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A subcategory of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). It occurs in people who smoke and suffer from chronic bronchitis. It is characterized by inflation of the alveoli, alveolar wall damage, and reduction in the number of alveoli, resulting in difficulty breathing.
An acute or chronic inflammatory process affecting the bronchi.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the indicator relating to medication use and personal medical history.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)
